fmesher 0.0.6.9000

fmesher

What is this repository for?

  • fmesher is a work in progress R package aiming to create a standalone package of the mesh and SPDE/GMRF finite element code currently part of the INLA package

How do I get set up?

```{r }

devtools::install_github(“finnlindgren/fmesher”) ```

Who do I talk to?

  • Finn Lindgren finn.lindgren@gmail.com
